hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: command_list
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
# Columns Explained: ssh ip, ssh port, username, bash command
# Trigger blog backup for blog*.dennyzhang.com 172.17.0.5:22:root:/opt/devops/backup_wp_mysql.sh www.dennyzhang.com:2702:ubuntu:/opt/devops/backup_wp_mysql.sh
# Remove old Gitlab bacukpset 172.17.0.4:22:root:find /var/opt/gitlab/backups/ -name "*.tar" -mtime +7 -and -not -type d -delete
# Remove old JIR backupset 172.17.0.3:22:root:find /var/atlassian/application-data/jira/export/ -name "*.zip" -mtime +7 -and -not -type d -delete
# Remove old Confluence backupset 172.17.0.3:22:root:find /var/atlassian/application-data/confluence/backups/ -name "*.zip" -mtime +7 -and -not -type d -delete
# Trigger Gitlab backup 172.17.0.4:22:root:gitlab-rake gitlab:backup:create
# Remove old remote backup older than 30 days 104.236.159.226:22:root:find /data/backup/denny_demo -type f -mtime +30 -and -not -type d -delete
# Trigger blog backup for www.oscgc.com www.oscgc.com:22:centos:/opt/devops/backup_wp_mysql.sh

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -e function download_script() { local download_file=${1?} . /etc/profile [ -n "$DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME" ] || export DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME="tag_v1" working_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins" bash_script="${working_dir}/${download_file}" dir_name=$(dirname "$bash_script")
export DOWNLOAD_PREFIX="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_jenkins/${DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME}" if [ ! -f "$bash_script" ]; then mkdir -p "$dir_name" wget -O "$bash_script" "${DOWNLOAD_PREFIX}/${download_file}" chmod 755 "$bash_script" fi } ################################################################################ download_file="jenkins/run_remote_command.sh" download_script "$download_file" bash -e "/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins/$download_file"
